about_the_game:
Digital Art Book for Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!

Features:
  • Total number of pages: 124.
  • Format for Art book is .pdf.
  • Contains images of all of the characters, enemies, and companions found in Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!
  • Digital Art book can be located in: ..\Steam\steamapps\common\Drumpf 2 Lost But Not Forgotten\Artbook[/list]

content_descriptors.notes: There are gratuitous depictions of both sexual acts and violence in this game. If you are not okay with either of those things, this may not be the game for you.

name: Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten! - Digital Art Book

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 500 MHz
